## Classes

### routinator

Install and configure routinator

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `routinator` class.

##### `rtr_bind`

Data type: `String`

rtr bind address

Default value: '127.0.0.1'

##### `rtr_port`

Data type: `Integer`

rtr port address

Default value: 3323

##### `http_bind`

Data type: `String`

rtr bind address

Default value: '127.0.0.1'

##### `http_port`

Data type: `Integer`

rtr port address

Default value: 8323

### routinator::service

Handle routinator service

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `routinator::service` class.

##### `service_name`

Data type: `String`

Routinator service name, OS dependant

Default value: $routinator::params::service_name
